ecommerce.title: E-commerce Integration
ecommerce.description: Seamlessly integrate with your online store and automate your shipping process. Compatible with all major e-commerce platforms.

warehousing.title: Warehousing & Fulfillment
warehousing.description: Store your inventory in our strategically located warehouses and let us handle the picking, packing, and shipping.

bulkShipping.description: Special rates and dedicated support for high-volume shippers. Save more as you ship more.

calculator.subtitle: Get an instant estimate for your shipment

descriptions.createAccount: Sign up for free and set up your business profile in minutes.
descriptions.bookShipment: Enter shipment details and choose your preferred delivery option.
descriptions.trackDeliver: Track your shipment in real-time until it reaches its destination.
descriptions.overnight: Get orders delivered on the very next day! Guaranteed with a success rate of 98%, one of the highest rates in the industry.
descriptions.visibility: Have live updates day by day about your financials through our Wallet available in our dashboard.
descriptions.coverage: Our extensive network covers all major cities and remote areas, ensuring your packages reach every corner of the country.
descriptions.services: Empowering businesses with our comprehensive logistics solutions
descriptions.howItWorks: Simple, efficient, and reliable shipping process

footer.connectDescription: Follow us on social media for updates and promotions

about.title: Why Choose Us
about.subtitle: What sets ShipFast apart from other logistics providers

speed.title: Speed & Efficiency
speed.description: Our advanced routing algorithms and extensive network enable us to deliver packages faster than traditional carriers, with a 98% on-time delivery rate.

reliability.title: Reliability & Security
reliability.description: Your shipments are in safe hands with our secure handling procedures and real-time tracking technology that monitors every package from pickup to delivery.

cost.title: Cost-Effective Solutions
cost.description: Our optimized operations and volume-based pricing allow us to offer competitive rates without compromising on service quality or delivery speed.

support.title: Exceptional Support
support.description: Our dedicated customer service team is available 7 days a week to assist with any questions or concerns, ensuring a smooth shipping experience.

aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.subtitle: Learn more about our mission and values
aboutus.missionText: To revolutionize the logistics industry in Egypt by providing innovative, reliable, and efficient delivery solutions.
aboutus.visionText: To become the leading logistics platform in the Middle East, connecting businesses with trusted couriers.
aboutus.reliabilityText: We ensure every package reaches its destination safely and on time.
aboutus.innovationText: We continuously improve our technology to provide better services.
aboutus.transparencyText: We maintain clear communication and honest pricing with our customers.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your business needs

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.question1: How does the delivery process work?
faq.answer1: Simply create an order, select a courier, and track your package in real-time.
faq.answer2: Our fees are competitive and transparent. Check our pricing page for details.
faq.question3: How can I track my package?
faq.answer3: You can track your package using our mobile app or website with real-time updates.
faq.question4: What if my package is damaged?
faq.answer4: We have insurance coverage for all packages. Contact support for assistance.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App
mobileApp.subtitle: Download our mobile app for the best experience
mobileApp.trackingText: Track your packages with live GPS updates
mobileApp.notificationsText: Get instant updates about your deliveries
mobileApp.easyOrderingText: Create and manage orders with just a few taps

tracking.title: Track Your Package
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking number to get real-time updates

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we protect and use your information
privacyPolicy.introductionText: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information.
privacyPolicy.informationCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically.
privacyPolicy.informationUseText: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.informationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties.
